Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimization where some or all variables are restricted to be integers.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization of a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimization of a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints.

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Optimization with both continuous and integer variables.
Example: Production planning with discrete and continuous decisions.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimization where the objective function and constraints are convex.

Name: Combinatorial Optimization
Description: Optimization over a discrete solution set.

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Optimization under uncertainty where some data is random.
